text.0: hear thou my call o indra be not heedless thine may we be for thee to give us treasures.
text.1: for these presented viands seeking riches increase thy strength like streams of water flowing.
text.2: floods great and many compassed by the dragon thou badest swell and settest free o hero.
text.3: strengthened by songs of praise thou rentest piecemeal the dāsa him who deemed himself immortal.
text.4: for hero in the lauds wherein thou joyedst in hymns of praise o indra songs of rudras.
text.5: these streams in which is thy delight approach thee even as the brilliant ones draw near to vāyu.
text.6: we who add strength to thine own splendid vigour laying within thine arms the splendid thunder.
text.7: with us mayst thou o indra waxen splendid with sūrya overcome the dāsa races.
text.8: hero thou slewest in thy valour ahi concealed in depths mysterious great enchanter.
text.9: dwelling enveloped deep within the waters him who checked heaven and stayed the floods from flowing.
text.10: indra we laud thy great deeds wrought aforetime we laud thine exploits later of achievement.
text.11: we laud the bolt that in thine arms lies eager we laud thy two bay steeds heralds of sūrya.
text.12: indra thy bay steeds showing forth their vigour have sent a loud cry out that droppeth fatness.
text.13: the earth hath spread herself in all her fulness the cloud that was about to move hath rested.
text.14: down never ceasing hath the raincloud settled bellowing it hath wandered with the mothers.
text.15: swelling the roar in the far distant limits they have spread wide the blast sent forth by indra.
text.16: indra hath hurled down the magician vṛtra who lay beleaguering the mighty river.
text.17: then both the heaven and earth trembled in terror at the strong heros thunder when he bellowed.
text.18: loud roared the mighty heros bolt of thunder when he the friend of man burnt up the monster.
text.19: and having drunk his fill of flowing soma baffled the guileful dānavas devices.
text.20: drink thou o hero indra drink the soma let the joygiving juices make thee joyful.
text.21: they filling both thy flanks shall swell thy vigour the juice that satisfies hath helped indra.
text.22: singers have we become with thee o indra may we serve duly and prepare devotion.
text.23: seeking thy help we meditate thy praises may we at once enjoy thy gift of riches.
text.24: may we be thine such by thy help o indra as swell thy vigour while they seek thy favour.
text.25: give us thou god the riches that we long for most powerful with stare of noble children.
text.26: give us a friend give us an habitation indra give us the company of maruts.
text.27: and those whose minds accord with theirs the vāyus who drink the first libation of the soma.
text.28: let those enjoy in whom thou art delighted indra drink soma for thy strength and gladness.
text.29: thou hast exalted us to heaven preserver in battles through the lofty hymns that praise thee.
text.30: great verily are they o thou protector who by their songs of praise have won the blessing.
text.31: they who strew sacred grass to be thy dwelling helped by thee have got them strength o indra.
text.32: upon the great trikadruka days hero rejoicing thee o indra drink the soma.
text.33: come with bay steeds to drink of libation shaking the drops from out thy beard contented.
text.34: hero assume the might wherewith thou clavest vṛtra piecemeal the dānava aurṇavābha.
text.35: thou hast disclosed the light to light the Ārya on thy left hand o indra sank the dasyu.
text.36: may we gain wealth subduing with thy succour and with the Ārya all our foes the dasyus.
text.37: our gain was that to tṛta of our party thou gavest up tvaṣṭars son viśvarūpa.
text.38: he cast down arbuda what time his vigour was strengthened by libations poured by tṛta.
text.39: indra sent forth his whirling wheel like sūrya and aided by the aṅgirases rent vala.
text.40: now let that wealthy cow of thine o indra yield in return a boon to him who lauds thee.
text.41: give to thy praisers let not fortune fail us loud may we speak with brave men in the assembly.
